title: Khloe Kardashian shows off curvy figure in black workout wear
text:
She's the host of the E! reality series Revenge Body.

And Khloe Kardashian truly had curves to die for on Friday, when the 35-year-old blonde bombshell was spotted leaving a workout in clingy black leggings.

The reality TV star was joined by Scott Disick and her pregnant BFF Malika Haqq for the sweat session.

Back to black: Khloe Kardashian truly had curves to die for on Friday, when the 35-year-old blonde bombshell was spotted leaving a workout in clingy black leggings

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians mainstay paired the flattering garment with a matching black top and a Louis Vuitton backpack.

On her feet were pink and black Nike sneakers.

The mother-of-one wore her dyed blonde tresses loose as she made her way to a waiting SUV, and shielded her eyes with dark sunglasses.

Her co-star Scott meanwhile looked very casual in a tracksuit and white sneakers.

Squad goals: The reality TV star was joined by Scott Disick and her pregnant BFF Malika Haqq for the sweat session

Accessories: The Keeping Up With the Kardashians mainstay paired the flattering garment with a matching black top and a Louis Vuitton backpack

Khloe's BFF Malika Haqq showed off her baby bump in her own form-fitting workout wear.

The 36-year-old Sky High actress' bulge could be seen clearly beneath her camouflage leggings.

Haqq announced that she is expecting her first child in an Instagram post last month, but did not reveal the father's identity.

Malika's sister, Khadija Haqq McCray, also joined the trio and sported animal print workout gear.

Laid back: Her co-star Scott meanwhile looked very casual in a tracksuit and white sneakers

Bumping along nicely! Khloe's BFF Malika Haqq showed off her baby bump in her own form-fitting workout wear

Khloe and her sister Kourtney's ex Scott were on hand to help open the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino on Thursday in Hollywood, Florida.

Also there was Disick's current squeeze, Sofia Richie, 21.

After walking the red carpet, Scott and Sofia headed up to their suite to decompress, leaving Khloe to mingle with the other celebs on hand, including Johnny Depp and Morgan Freeman.

Oh baby! The 36-year-old Sky High actress' bulge could be seen clearly beneath her camouflage leggings

Sister, sister: Malika's sister, Khadija Haqq McCray, also joined the trio and sported animal print workout gear

Selfie-obsessed: Khloe of course couldn't resist the impulse to grab a few filter-assisted images of herself for social media
description: Khloe Kardashian truly had curves to die for on Friday, when the 35-year-old blonde bombshell was spotted leaving a workout in clingy black leggings.
